tool_description: Get workout exercises for every muscle group. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/exercises.
title: Exercises by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/exercises
api_list.description: API Ninjas Exercises API endpoint. Returns up to 10 exercises that satisfy the given parameters.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: number of results to offset for pagination. Default is 0.

parameters.name: muscle
parameters.description:
muscle group targeted by the exercise. Possible values are:

abdominals
abductors
adductors
biceps
calves
chest
forearms
glutes
hamstrings
lats
lower_back
middle_back
neck
quadriceps
traps
triceps

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
exercise type. Possible values are:

cardio
olympic_weightlifting
plyometrics
powerlifting
strength
stretching
strongman

parameters.name: difficulty
parameters.description:
difficulty level of the exercise. Possible values are:

beginner
intermediate
expert

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: name of exercise. This value can be partial (e.g. press will match Dumbbell Bench Press)

utterances.utterance: Show me strength exercises for the chest.
What are some expert-level plyometrics exercises?
Show me stretching exercises for the hamstrings.
Find intermediate-level exercises for the lower back.
What are some exercises that include the word 'press'?
Find beginner-level exercises for the glutes.
Show me olympic weightlifting exercises for the triceps.
